Summary: I thought I was looking at stars they were stable white then all the sudden they started moving across the sky
divs: Sighting Details I was out watching the eclipse all night in my own yard out in the country .. -nothing fancy. I thought I was looking at stars they were still fixed objects then they started moving across the sky white in color weird smooth movement I watched them as they left out of my view this is 4 seperate lights not a formation 4 separate events within 30 minutes One grew brighter and then moved across the sky till it was gone. all objects started out as stationary with no movement . as I said I thought I was looking at bright stars. It made my hair stand up on my body. Just absolutey fascinating. I have made a report of my sighting in January 2007. I thought I should also report this. People have got to learn to get out and see this stuff for themselves. It's unbelievable what is going on in our skies.
